member.name: T:Shared.Application.Mediator.Unit
member.summary: Represents a void-like type, used when a method or request does not return a value.
member.remarks: Since C# does not allow void as a generic type parameter, can be used to represent an empty return type in generic contexts, such as MediatR requests.

member.summary: Singleton instance of .
